summary: Google Maps is a popular online tool that helps people find their way around. It shows maps, satellite pictures, and street views. You can use it to plan trips by car, bike, or even on foot. More than one billion people use it every month! It started as a computer program and was bought by Google in 2004. Since then, it has grown to include real-time traffic updates and directions on mobile phones. It's one of the most-used apps on smartphones worldwide.
title: Google Maps
